attributes.action: REASSURE US THAT THE UK POLICE STATE WON'T BECOME A FULL TOTALITARIAN AUTOCRACY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Much of our freedom has already been removed and so much authoritarian and totalitarian control is in place that it makes sense to develop the Labour philosophy to ultimate extremism. Moves to introduce internment are happening NOW. The mechanisms for control are in place already. Will the PM reassure us that this will not happen ?.
